title: Min length username
userStory:
As a user

I would like to create a username that is at least 5 characters long

So that I can create a great username
acceptanceCriteria:
1. When I enter less than 5 characters

A validation message should appear stating: 'A minimum of 5 characters is required'

2. When I enter 5 characters or more

The name is valid

partitions.description: Anything with less than 5 characters is invalid
partitions.exampleDescription: Whether the length of the name is 0, 1, 2, 3 or 4 characters long, the validation will show the username as invalid

partitions.description: Anything with 5 or more characters is valid
partitions.exampleDescription: For any names that are 5 characters or more, the validation will show the username as valid

validations.message: A minimum of 5 characters is required
A minimum of 5 characters is required
